trans-unit.source: Represents a field that displays navigation controls in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control enable users to page through data.
trans-unit.target: 탐색 컨트롤을 표시 하는 필드를 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 컨트롤에는 사용자가 데이터를 페이징할 수 있도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField class represents a field that displays navigation controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 클래스 나타냅니다에 탐색 컨트롤을 표시 하는 필드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: These navigation controls can be used to page through data that are displayed by a control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer> interface, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 탐색 컨트롤을 사용할 수 있습니다가 구현 하는 컨트롤에서 표시 되는 데이터는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>인터페이스와 같은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField class provides buttons that enable users to navigate through the pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 클래스는 사용자가 한 번에 한 페이지씩 데이터 페이지를 탐색 하거나 첫 번째 또는 마지막 데이터 페이지로 이동할 수 있도록 하는 단추를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the NextPreviousPagerField object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A> property to set the style of the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 NextPreviousPagerField 개체의 모양을 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>속성을 단추 스타일을 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property to choose the type of button that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성을 표시 되는 단추 종류를 선택 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 사용 가능한 단추 목록을 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Button type|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| You can hide a NextPreviousPagerField object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: | 단추 유형을 | 설명 | |-----------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>제어 합니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>제어 합니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>제어 합니다. | NextPreviousPagerField 개체를 숨길 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>설정 하 여 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A>속성을 `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: You can also hide the individual buttons (the first-page, previous-page, next-page, and last-page buttons) by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 개별 단추 (첫 번째 페이지, 이전 페이지, 다음 페이지 및 마지막 페이지 단추)을 숨길 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A>속성을 `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField control enables you to specify custom text for each button by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 컨트롤을 사용 하면 각 단추에 대 한 사용자 지정 텍스트를 사용 하 여 지정할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must provide the URL to an image that will be displayed for the button.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성이 `ButtonType.Image`를 단추에 대해 표시 되는 이미지에 URL을 제공 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set images individually for each button by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 각 단추에 대해 개별적으로 이미지를 설정 하 여 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `ButtonType.Image`, 대체 텍스트는 이미지에 대 한 해당 텍스트 속성이 작동 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the text that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A> property is displayed as the alternate text for the first-page image button.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 지정 된 텍스트는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>속성이 첫 번째 페이지 이미지 단추에 대 한 대체 텍스트로 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명을 지 원하는 브라우저에서는이 텍스트는 도구 설명으로도 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the NextPreviousPagerField constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> 의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 NextPreviousPagerField 생성자를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically used when you are adding fields to a dynamically created <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 필드를 추가 하는 동적으로 생성 하는 경우에 일반적으로이 생성자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object dynamically to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>개체를 동적으로 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>제어 하 고, 새 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>개체 속성을 설정 하 고 다음에 대 한 필드 컬렉션에 추가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to render the buttons of the pager field on the browser.
trans-unit.target: 브라우저에서 페이저 필드의 단추를 렌더링 하는 데 사용 되는 연계 스타일 시트 (CSS) 클래스를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonCssClass property to specify the CSS class to render on the browser for the buttons of the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 페이저 필드의 단추에 대 한 브라우저에 렌더링 하는 CSS 클래스를 지정 하려면 ButtonCssClass 속성을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 항상 브라우저에 관계 없이 클래스 특성으로 렌더링 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the ButtonCssClass property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > CSS를 지원 하지 않는 브라우저에서는 설정 ButtonCssClass 속성은 효과가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 viewstate에 저장 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The CSS class used to render the buttons of the pager field on the client.
trans-unit.target: 클라이언트에서 페이저 필드의 단추를 렌더링 하는 데 사용 되는 CSS 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the ButtonCssClass property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 문자열 ButtonCssClass 속성이 설정 되어 있지 않음을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the button type to display in the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 페이저 필드에 표시할 단추 종류를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonType property to specify which type of button is displayed in a button field.
trans-unit.target: ButtonType 속성 단추 유형을 지정을 사용 하 여 단추 필드에 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 사용 가능한 단추 목록을 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Button type value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| When ButtonType is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must set the image to display for the buttons by using the properties shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: | 단추 종류 값 | 설명 | |-----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>제어 합니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>제어 합니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>제어 합니다. | ButtonType로 설정 되 면 `ButtonType.Image`, 다음 표에 표시 된 속성을 사용 하 여 단추에 표시할 이미지를 설정 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| The value of the ButtonType property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 설명 | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>| 첫 번째 페이지 단추에 표시할 이미지에 URL. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>| 이전 페이지 단추에 표시할 이미지에 URL. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>| 다음 페이지 단추에 대해 표시할 이미지에 URL. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>| 마지막 페이지 단추에 대해 표시할 이미지에 URL. | ButtonType 속성의 값은 viewstate에 저장 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value for the ButtonType property is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: ButtonType 속성에 대 한 값이 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재의 속성을 복사 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 를 지정한 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CopyProperties 메서드는 도우미 메서드입니다.

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>현재 속성 복사 하려면 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>에 전달 되는 개체는 `newField` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> 현재 속성을 복사 하도록 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates the user interface (UI) controls for the pager field object and adds them to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 페이저 필드 개체에 대 한 인터페이스 (UI) 컨트롤을 만들고 지정된 된 컨테이너에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataPagers method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the UI controls for the pager field, such as the Previous and Next buttons.
trans-unit.target: CreateDataPagers 메서드를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>이전 및 다음 단추와 같이 페이저 필드에 대 한 UI를 만드는 메서드를 제어 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The container that is used to store the controls.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤을 저장 하는 데 사용 되는 컨테이너입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on the page.
trans-unit.target: 페이지에서 첫 번째 레코드의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 단일 페이지에 있는 항목의 최대 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The total number of items.
trans-unit.target: 항목의 총 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data pager field in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 페이저 필드의 인덱스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 만들고의 새 인스턴스를 반환 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A> method of the base class to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: CreateField 메서드는에서 사용 되는 도우미 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>를 만드는 빈 기본 클래스의 메서드 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 지정된 된 개체가 같은지 여부를 결정 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Equals method to determine whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object is equal to the object that is specified by the `o` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Equals 메서드를 사용 하는지 여부를 현재 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>개체에서 지정 된 개체와 같은지는 `o` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Equals returns `true` if the two objects contain exactly the same values for all public properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: 반환 같음 `true` 두 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> 의 모든 public 속성에 대 한 동일한 값이 정확히을 포함 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재와 비교할 개체 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>지정 된 개체가 현재 같으면 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 개체; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 페이지 단추에 표시 되는 이미지에 URL을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the FirstPageImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성이 `ButtonType.Image` 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `true`, FirstPageImageUrl 속성을 사용 하 여 첫 번째 페이지 단추에 표시 되는 이미지에 URL을 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 이 이미지는 브라우저에서 지원 되는 모든 파일 형식 (예:.jpg,.gif,.bmp, 및 등) 일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the FirstPageImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성 이외의 값으로 설정 됩니다 `ButtonType.Image`, FirstPageImageUrl 속성을 설정 해도 효과가 없습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 viewstate에 저장 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 페이지 단추에 표시 되는 이미지 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the FirstPageImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 문자열 (""), FirstPageImageUrl 속성이 설정 되어 있지 않음을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 페이지 단추에 표시 되는 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the FirstPageText property to specify the text to display for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `true`, FirstPageText 속성을 사용 하 여 첫 번째 페이지 단추에 대해 표시할 텍스트를 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the FirstPageText property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성이 `ButtonType.Image`, 이미지가 표시 되 고 FirstPageText 속성이 역할 이미지에 대 한 대체 텍스트를.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명을 지 원하는 브라우저에서는이 텍스트는 도구 설명으로도 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 viewstate에 저장 하 고 디자이너 도구를 사용 하 여 리소스 파일에 자동으로 저장 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>및 [전역화 및 지역화](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 페이지 단추에 표시 되는 텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is "First".
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 "First".

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 해시 함수 역할을 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재에 대 한 해시 코드 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles events that occur in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> control and performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: 발생 하는 이벤트를 처리는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 제어 하 고 적절 한 조치를 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: HandleEvent 메서드는에서 사용 되는 도우미 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called to handle events that occur in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 발생 하는 이벤트를 처리 하 라고는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>컨트롤 내부의 단추 중 하나를 클릭 하면 개체.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method examines the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: HandleEvent 메서드를 검사 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>에 포함 된 개체는 `e` 매개 변수를 다음 적절 한 조치를 수행 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the buttons that are provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> control and the action that is performed when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서에서 제공 되는 단추를 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>제어 및 단추를 클릭할 때 수행 되는 작업.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: |Button|CommandName value|Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |First page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the first page of data.| |Previous page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the previous page of data.| |Next page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the next page of data.| |Last page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the last page of data.|
trans-unit.target: | 단추 | CommandName 값 | 작업 | |------------|-----------------------|------------| | 첫 페이지 | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>| 데이터의 첫 번째 페이지를 탐색 합니다. | | 이전 페이지 | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>| 데이터의 이전 페이지로 이동 합니다. | | 다음 페이지 | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>| 데이터의 다음 페이지로 이동 합니다. | | 마지막 페이지 | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>| 마지막으로 데이터 페이지를 탐색 합니다. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `true`, NextPageText 속성을 사용 하 여 다음 페이지 단추에 대해 표시할 텍스트를 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the NextPageText property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성이 `ButtonType.Image`, 이미지가 표시 되 고 NextPageText 속성이 역할 이미지에 대 한 대체 텍스트를.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명을 지 원하는 브라우저에서는이 텍스트는 도구 설명으로도 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 viewstate에 저장 하 고 디자이너 도구를 사용 하 여 리소스 파일에 자동으로 저장 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>및 [전역화 및 지역화](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for the next-page button.
trans-unit.target: 다음 페이지 단추에 대해 표시 되는 텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Next".
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 "다음".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이전 페이지 단추에 대해 표시 되는 이미지에 URL을 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the PreviousPageImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성이 `ButtonType.Image` 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `true`, PreviousPageImageUrl 속성을 사용 하 여 이전 페이지 단추에 표시 되는 이미지에 URL을 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 이 이미지는 브라우저에서 지원 되는 모든 파일 형식 (예:.jpg,.gif,.bmp, 및 등) 일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the PreviousPageImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성 이외의 값으로 설정 됩니다 `ButtonType.Image`, PreviousPageImageUrl 속성을 설정 해도 효과가 없습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 viewstate에 저장 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이전 페이지 단추에 대해 표시 되는 이미지에 URL의 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the PreviousPageImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 문자열 (""), PreviousPageImageUrl 속성이 설정 되어 있지 않음을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Previous".
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 "이전".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether disabled buttons are rendered as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref> controls by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 비활성화 된 단추도 렌더링 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"> </xref> 하 여 제어는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels property to specify whether disabled buttons are rendered as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: 비활성화 된 단추도 렌더링 되는지 여부를 지정 하려면 RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels 속성을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>하 여 제어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>

trans-unit.source: The buttons are disabled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object when the function associated with the button cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 여는 단추가 비활성화 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>단추와 연결 된 기능을 수행할 수 없는 경우 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you are in the first page of data, the first-page and previous-page buttons are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 데이터의 첫 페이지에 있는 첫 번째 페이지와 이전 페이지 단추 비활성화 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object renders the disabled buttons by using the control type specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>로 지정 된 컨트롤 형식을 사용 하 여 비활성화 된 단추를 렌더링 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: It also sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property of the control to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 또한 설정는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>컨트롤의 속성 `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control to render the disabled buttons.
trans-unit.target: RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels로 설정 되 면 `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>개체에서 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>비활성화 된 단추를 렌더링 하는 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A> property is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>속성은 설정 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 viewstate에 저장 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if disabled buttons are rendered as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref> controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>비활성화 된 단추도 렌더링 되 면 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"> </xref> 제어 하 고; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 사이의 줄 바꿈하지 않는 공백 렌더링 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character) are rendered between the navigation controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls 속성을 사용 하 여 지정할 수 있는지 여부를 줄 바꿈하지 않는 공백 (HTML ` ` 문자)의 탐색 컨트롤 사이 렌더링 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>개체.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: You can set RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls to `false` if you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes.
trans-unit.target: RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls를 설정할 수 있습니다 `false` 레이아웃 연계 스타일 시트 (CSS) 클래스를 만들면을 보다 자세히 제어 해야 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 viewstate에 저장 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤 사이 줄 바꿈하지 않는 공백이 렌더링 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.
